website_summaries.verdict: Includes some nice extras not available in other kits, but pricier as well.
pros: Features 24 different sized tabs and an LED light board to make it easier to find dents
Tools are made of stainless steel
Works well for automotive and refrigerator dents
cons: The light board isn't that powerful
Kit is much more expensive than many other similar ones

customer_reviews.title: I'm not perfect with it and i will practice more but I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking about this kind of kit for a long time. I picked the biggest one because it has all sort of tools to work with dents. I already try a couple of them and fixed a big dent on my trunk. I'm not perfect with it and i will practice more but I'm very satisfied. I have a few more dents to go on my and my girlfriend's car. And friends already are lining up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great set, took a few dents out waiting till ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set,took a few dents out waiting till after the holidays to try some larger ones. has everything you need except for 90 to 100% isopropyl alcohol bought at your local drugstore to use as a release agent for the glue.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Fly5d service and product excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fly5d was very responsive to my finding a component that was defective. Email response within a day, and replacement went out within a day of email interaction. I received the replacement by USPS this week, and works well as expected. I would buy from fly5d as my service experience was excellent, and I feel this product is very good to excellent,
customer_reviews.author: apple

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WONDERS...
customer_reviews.text: This is like magic. Takes time to get the dents out but it WORKS.... My husband loves the kit and it's like a new toy to him. He got practically all of the dents out of our jeep which we had lots of dents from off road trails. The kit is well worth it and more.
customer_reviews.author: Life Is Good

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This dent removal tool kit worked perfectly for the type repairs I needed on my truck. Watched videos which were very helpful for the techniques you need to use. Recommend it for DIY small dent repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: My husband and sons love this. They said it's easy to use and ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and sons love this. They said it's easy to use and just as good as more expensive ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not shipped with LED light, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The kit is described to contain a LED light board, however mine came with a simple plastic board with lines painted on it instead. If there is enough light available, this works ok but reduces your flexibility regarding repair location. The one star primarily relates to the dishonest advertising/“shipping mistake”. The rest of the kit appears decent for an occasional user like myself.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just thought this long metal puller was a light thing made with durability, before trial, i need to choose the right size of tabs according to my dents on the car, not 100% fit, while the tab was large enough to cover the dent, those tabs are also durable, no broken ones yet, respectable item to assist you with home dent removal.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: not complete
customer_reviews.text: Would of been real nice if they advised me I also needed to buy glue. Now have to wait many more days for glue to arrive. Well after writing this they did me right and sent me a free glue gun as I already bought the glue. Will have to wait for it to warm up here a bit before I can try it when the snow melts I guess but looks like a good sturdy product with many different size pullers. Will update in few weeks when I get to try it as glue and cold don't mix well.
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: great set
customer_reviews.text: Im slowly pulling dents out of my truck bed.. its a slow process because the sheet metal is thick on big truck but it works.. for a ricer grinder this thing would pull your doors off. Oh rice grinder is not PC.. excuse me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Prinz

customer_reviews.title: Wanna save time n money, have this kit handy n u wouldnt need to go anywhere.. Q
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a kit that i could use for dent repair rather than going to a near auto repair shop, fortunately i found this kit which has everything that i needed for the job..now i dont have to look any further for repair services n just do it at home with the help of this kit..pretty handy n easy to use..i show this to my friend he was also very happy too see this product....i am loving this with working by this product
customer_reviews.author: Kamran Baig

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginners! The glue gun has an on off switch which will save you a lot of glue. The light is LED and works well. The tabs are a little cheap but still pull well. The hammers, slide hammer and lift appear to be made out of quality metal. This was the most affordable kit with and LED light. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: What a gimmick. Tried and tested all the that came with it. Just another product trying to capitalize on folks who are DIYers
customer_reviews.author: judd

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good tool and easy to use on small to midsize dents . I used it a hand full of times now and it works very well . One thing I did notice is that if you let the glue worm up for about 20 minutes it comes out of the gun better and let the glue set up for 15-20 minutes it gets a better hold . Good tool for what you are getting
customer_reviews.author: David Gwinn

customer_reviews.title: A lot of value!
customer_reviews.text: There are a ton a tools in this set! I have been using this to fix some of the dents on a beater that I just bought, and it has been working well. I did end up tearing in two one of the little glue nibs (not exactly sure what they are called), but they are super easy to purchase and I am sure that this happens quite often.
customer_reviews.author: McKay Moore

customer_reviews.title: Dose it work? Worth it? What is included? I'll will answer!
customer_reviews.text: It dose not come with the glue gun or glue. You don't know what type of glue you need so I just used a hot glue gun because thats how it looked into the video. It doesn't work without the glue. When you use it it takes away a huge pice of your cars paint. Now I have to go buy paint for my car. It really dose not work. FONT WAIST YOUR MONEY NOT WORTH IT AT ALL. DO NOT BUY. I never give my products bad reviews even if I don't like them very much but this was unexceptional. It dose not include gun or glue.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It costs too much to go to the auto body ...
customer_reviews.text: It costs too much to go to the auto body shop. Even a small dent costs you more than this repair set. I bought this set to fix my 2002 Honda CRV. There are some dents on this 16 year old car and I really don't want to spend too much on it. This set gives me a quick and cheap solution. The dents can be fixed in 20 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Eason

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Might be inferior glue? Followed directions and still wouldn't budge the dent on a ram box side. I know it's not too thick because I watched YouTube videos of guys removing box dents. Light fixture is a joke and no power cable for the light.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: Great PDR kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother and my son for Christmas they both love the kits said they had everything necessary to do PDR of course on the smaller scale larger things you need the bigger set
customer_reviews.author: lynette or shaen

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't do anything...
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong it's easy to use, straigh forward, user friendly. But you'll be litteraly hard pressed if you could get a dent out of anything with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Orest

customer_reviews.title: what an amazing tools kit!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what an amazing tools kit! I never thought there is a such tool existing on the market. I was not sure if it works until I tried on my old car first. It worked exact as it described. I can't afford the body shop price. And I don't need repaint my car. This result is acceptable and much cheaper. Make sure you try and test with a small dent on a not that important spot first, then move to other dents.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Its good but missing the pully
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it but the item n pic was switched upon ordering.. DIDN'T have the pully stand for dents

customer_reviews.title: Poppin dents out like nothing.
customer_reviews.text: Works with ease! Simple installation to use and actually popped out my huge dent when someone swiped me. Big thing is to also purchase a hot glue gun and glue sticks as well because it’s not included. You can get that at any shop really. Saved me tons of money I stead of going to a auto body shop.
customer_reviews.author: Maxewell Phanvilay

customer_reviews.title: not as on TV
customer_reviews.text: the suction did not work, the hot glue did not work. I have a feeling the wrong glue sticks were sent. the glue sticks were in the box just thrown inside not in a package and they look like house craft glue this made for a difficult process and frustrating attempts.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete waste of money, just use the money you would use to buy this and go to your local auto body shop.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use product,Be willing to share good things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... so surprised this bag includes all high quality and useful tools. It repairs many things anywhere as you ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised this bag includes all high quality and useful tools. It repairs many things anywhere as you needed. Highly recommend to all car owners!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian White

customer_reviews.title: Dent puller
customer_reviews.text: Well one off the pieces of the little cups was already broken and didn’t come with a bag or little case for it but it works for miner nips and dents
customer_reviews.author: Sabas

customer_reviews.title: works grate
customer_reviews.text: had a dent on my motorcycle gas tank and it works just like in the advertisement clams!

customer_reviews.title: Helps with large dent jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of glue tabs for multiple dent jobs.

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: is awesome. work well and better than a couple of other sets bought. would buy again if nneded and the equipment is great. I would recomend this set to all.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every thing but I think the light was deficted only ligts on top row and bottem row

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product did really work all you need is patience and strength

customer_reviews.title: Works great But Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It worked great nice bag to keep it all together but was missing a few parts

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this kit and it was incomplete when it arrived. Ordered a replacement and it was also incomplete. Total waste of time.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value kit to start diy with. Slide hammer could weigh more.

customer_reviews.title: Pieces of my kit are missing
customer_reviews.text: I received my PDR kit today and it was missing the dent repair lifter. How do I contact someone to get it replaced?

customer_reviews.title: the glue is super difficult to be taken out of the car surface
customer_reviews.text: Works as described, the glue is super difficult to be taken out of the car surface. The board light is nearly impossible to use and has no power to show any lines.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: T bar pull broke after a few days of use it, the thread on the tip stripped, not really happy it happened thought tool was stronger than that but it is easy to use. Not the best quality
customer_reviews.author: Seguy D Henry

customer_reviews.title: Refecting line board broke quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a really nice set. Only problem was the flex bar for the reflection line board is too stiff and broke after a few times of flexing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kit looks great can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.text: Received the box and was missing the spring for the puller. They quickly fixed the issue by sending a replacment. The kit looks great can't wait to use it

customer_reviews.title: Glue gun works good and the tools seemed to work fine
customer_reviews.text: The light mounting stick was Broken with missing pieces as if someone had returned it already. Glue gun works good and the tools seemed to work fine. Very miniature tools, almost looks like kids toys, definitely beginners set but seem to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Celia A. Braun

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, great seller
customer_reviews.text: Very usefull and handy kit. Got dents removed no peoblem. Seller great to work with.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and high quality!! Only recommendation would be to include glue neutralizer!!! Thanks FLY

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 65 piece kit. Missing parts. Only black glue sticks. No tap hammer or bits. No bag. Line panel didn't come with flexible arm mount and wasn't usb powered. ** Glue gun is 12vdc cigarette lighter powered with a very short cord... idiotic design**!
customer_reviews.author: Scottjk

customer_reviews.title: This paid for itself in one use. Used it ...
customer_reviews.text: This paid for itself in one use. Used it to pop a dent in my Harley Davidson's fender. My daughters car is next she has a door someone kicked in at collage.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: I thought I ordered a 65 piece Dent removal kit ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered a 65 piece Dent removal kit but it is missing the bridge puller and tips. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The head of the plastic tab comes off easily just after two pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit
customer_reviews.text: I am no body man by any means but I was able to remove several dents from my truck with no experience at all. The kit paid for itself the first hour of use. All of the parts feel like good quality except for how the line board secures to the suction cup, it's useless. There is no way to keep the two pieces held together. Also no scraper was included but Amazon made it right with a small refund to cover the cost. All in all I would recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Better deals out there
customer_reviews.text: Glue gun broke after about 5 minutes, light in light board is too dim to help. Tools are decent but plan on getting a different board and gun.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Baysinger

customer_reviews.title: Dent Board  is a toy.
customer_reviews.text: In general is aceptable kit, not professional obviously. I don't feel satisfied with the Dent Board included..is like a toy just to refill this kit. The others components is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works wonderfully, saved us thousands of co-pay dollars, super easy to use also!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hess

customer_reviews.title: Came with alot of things missing
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst amazon experience yet. The board doesn't plug in anywhere and doesn't even come with a wire, missing the slide hammer, the glue gun doesn't come with a outlet plug in but rather plugs into the car which is so stupid because it's barely long enough to reach out the car. The bar to hold up the board came broken as well. Don't buy it. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy C

product_meta.title: Fly5D 65Pcs Auto Body Paintless Dent Removal Repair Tools Kits Silde Hammer Dent Lifter Glue Puller Sets with Tool Bag
product_meta.description:
Size:T-Bar Dent Puller Kit with LED light board

How to use these paintless dent puller tools :(Suit for dent&ding and home DIY repair)

1.clean dent surface

2.put the glue to gun and heat,connect the power source and preheat for 5-10 minutes

3.According to the Dent size to choose the Glue Puller, more bigger dent size,more bigger the glue puller and will larger force.

4.immediately place pad in the center of the dent and hold until sticks

5.Let the glue cool for about 8 minutes. The cooling time should be less than 10 minutes and should be shorter slightly in winter. 

6.After the glue cooling,use a dent lifter or T-bar to align and press the puller to pull up the dent.

7.Spray alcohol on the residual glue, remove it with glue scraper, clean the repaired place with a clean wet cloth

8.If dent still exists,repeat the steps to remove the dent more perfectly

Packing List:

1x LED dent board 

 

1x Tool bag 

 

1x black dent lifter 

 

1x 100W glue gun 

 

1x Pops a dent 

 

1x rubber hammer 

 

1x silver tap down

 

1x Silde hammer 

 

1x mini T-bar 

 

1x metal tap down with 9 heads 

 

1x Plastic shovel 

 

5x blue puller tabs 

 

9x black puller tabs 

 

4x yellow puller tabs

 

18x yellow glue sticks 

 

1x manual
feature_bullets: Yellow Glue Sticks has a strong viscosity,suitable for the relatively harder parts on cars;

Baking-varnish-free dent repair,Powerful enough to pull out dents in auto bodies,and for the washing machine's metal plate,any door flat dent;Widey Use,These PDR Tool also suitable for the sheet metal processing of automobile, refrigerator, Motorcycle Body and washing machine
Easy to control,in any where ebayone can removal the dent by yourself with dent removal tools;Every tool is meticulously inspected and certified for Rockwell Hardness
Tools are made from several types of Stainless steel. Tempered high carbon Stainless steels and standard stainless steel are used depending on the design of a particular tool
USB Dent board is used to check where is the denton the car ;Package as the No.1 picture shows,if there is missing parts or have any problems,please feel free to contact us.
